Weekly News and Updates around the Meteor JS Community

Meteor Weekly

Weekly News and Updates around the Meteor JS Community

published Every Monday covering meteor-talk, meteor-core, github, atmosphere and twitter
curated by @arunoda and edited by @alokag

Meteor Devshop, Meteor 0.9.3 and 0.9.4 RC and More

Meteor Devshop SF - September

Last week, we had devshop and it was packed with a lot of talks. Chris Mather previewed Iron Router 1.0 and that was an interesting talk among others.

  • Andrew Mao
  • Chris - Iron Router 1.0 Preview
  • Steve Caldwell - Strap
  • Markdown Templates
  • Robert now at MDG
  • Floobits - another template engine for Meteor
  • Daily Scrum
  • MeteorHelp
  • Hedgy
  • Atmosphere Discovery & Search
  • Meteor Day

New Meteor Releases - 0.9.3 and 0.9.4 RC

As I mentioned in the last episode, Meteor is doing new releases back to back very quickly. Continuing that trend, they released Meteor 0.9.3 with a lot of improvements to the it’s package versioning system last week.

Also, now we’ve Meteor 0.9.4 RC as well. It also comes with some of the notable features like:

  • meteor debug command to connect with node-inspector
  • meteor run --test option to run velocity tests
  • deprecate template declaration using Template.foo.helperName = func some new APIs and name changes

Worldwide Meteor Day

We have a surprise Meteor event on November 6. it’s Worldwide Meteor Day. But we are not aware about the full agenda yet!

Anyway, Meteor is releasing a lot of new releases. So we can think of something :)

  • Announcement at Devshop

Featured Discussions on Google Groups

  • Speaker Program - Do a Cordova/PhoneGap Lightning Talk
  • Reactive server side query count
  • Show MT - Timezone converter that understands you
  • Meteor._wrapAsync undefined
  • Spiderable on Production Server
  • Resource on Meteor Cordova
  • New Meteor Testing Book
  • Introducing Meteoris - Meteor Boilerplate with a good structure
  • Meteor Help - A catalog of content from the best in the Meteor
  • Deployment Stability at meteor.com
  • My experience hitting limits on Meteor performance
  • Confused about local package development in the /packages directory
  • Please add platform client-only
  • Meteor Build for specific platform
